001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping;
002
003
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Direction;
005import squidpony.squidmath.Coord;
006import squidpony.squidmath.GWTRNG;
007import squidpony.squidmath.IRNG;
008import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedSet;
009
010import java.util.ArrayDeque;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014/**
015 * Creates a dungeon in the style of the original Rogue game. It will always
016 * make a grid style of rooms where there are a certain number horizontally and
017 * vertically and it will link them only next to each other.
018 *
019 * This dungeon generator is based on a port of the rot.js version.
020 *
021 * @author hyakugei
022 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
023 */
024public class ClassicRogueMapGenerator implements IDungeonGenerator{
025
026    /**
027     * Holds the information needed to track rooms in the classic rogue
028     * generation algorithm.
029     */
030    private static class ClassicRogueRoom {
031
032        private int x;
033        private int y;
034        private int width;
035        private int height;
036        private final int cellx;
037        private final int celly;
038        private final OrderedSet<ClassicRogueRoom> connections = new OrderedSet<>(4);
039        ClassicRogueRoom(int x, int y, int width, int height, int cellx, int celly) {
040            this.x = x;
041            this.y = y;
042            this.width = width;
043            this.height = height;
044            this.cellx = cellx;
045            this.celly = celly;
046        }
047
048        @Override
049        public int hashCode() {
050            return Coord.rosenbergStrongHashCode(cellx, celly);
051            // the actual algorithm doesn't matter much here.
052            // another good option, if you don't feel like looking up rosenbergStrongHashCode(), is
053            //return (int)(0xC13FA9A902A6328FL * cellx + 0x91E10DA5C79E7B1DL * celly >>> 32);
054        }
055
056        @Override
057        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
058            if (obj == null) {
059                return false;
060            }
061            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
062                return false;
063            }
064            final ClassicRogueRoom other = (ClassicRogueRoom) obj;
065            if (cellx != other.cellx) {
066                return false;
067            }
068            return celly == other.celly;
069        }
070    }
071
072    private final IRNG rng;
073
074    private final int horizontalRooms;
075    private final int verticalRooms;
076    private final int dungeonWidth;
077    private final int dungeonHeight;
078    private int minRoomWidth;
079    private int maxRoomWidth;
080    private int minRoomHeight;
081    private int maxRoomHeight;
082    private ClassicRogueRoom[][] rooms;
083    private char[][] dungeon;
084    private final Direction[] dirToCheck = new Direction[4];
085    /**
086     * Initializes the generator to turn out random dungeons within the specific
087     * parameters.
088     *
089     * Will size down the room width and height parameters if needed to ensure
090     * the desired number of rooms will fit both horizontally and vertically.
091     *
092     * @param horizontalRooms How many rooms will be made horizontally
093     * @param verticalRooms How many rooms will be made vertically
094     * @param dungeonWidth How wide the total dungeon will be
095     * @param dungeonHeight How high the total dungeon will be
096     * @param minRoomWidth The minimum width a room can be
097     * @param maxRoomWidth The maximum width a room can be
098     * @param minRoomHeight The minimum height a room can be
099     * @param maxRoomHeight The maximum height a room can be
100     */
101    public ClassicRogueMapGenerator(int horizontalRooms, int verticalRooms, int dungeonWidth, int dungeonHeight,
102                                    int minRoomWidth, int maxRoomWidth, int minRoomHeight, int maxRoomHeight) {
103        this(horizontalRooms, verticalRooms, dungeonWidth, dungeonHeight, minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth, minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight, new GWTRNG());
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Initializes the generator to turn out random dungeons within the specific
108     * parameters.
109     *
110     * Will size down the room width and height parameters if needed to ensure
111     * the desired number of rooms will fit both horizontally and vertically.
112     *
113     * @param horizontalRooms How many rooms will be made horizontally
114     * @param verticalRooms How many rooms will be made vertically
115     * @param dungeonWidth How wide the total dungeon will be
116     * @param dungeonHeight How high the total dungeon will be
117     * @param minRoomWidth The minimum width a room can be
118     * @param maxRoomWidth The maximum width a room can be
119     * @param minRoomHeight The minimum height a room can be
120     * @param maxRoomHeight The maximum height a room can be
121     */
122    public ClassicRogueMapGenerator(int horizontalRooms, int verticalRooms, int dungeonWidth, int dungeonHeight,
123                                    int minRoomWidth, int maxRoomWidth, int minRoomHeight, int maxRoomHeight, IRNG rng)
124    {
125        this.rng = rng;
126        this.horizontalRooms = horizontalRooms;
127        this.verticalRooms = verticalRooms;
128        this.dungeonWidth = dungeonWidth;
129        this.dungeonHeight = dungeonHeight;
130        this.minRoomWidth = minRoomWidth;
131        this.maxRoomWidth = maxRoomWidth;
132        this.minRoomHeight = minRoomHeight;
133        this.maxRoomHeight = maxRoomHeight;
134
135        sanitizeRoomDimensions();
136    }
137
138    private void sanitizeRoomDimensions() {
139        int test = (dungeonWidth - 3 * horizontalRooms) / horizontalRooms;//have to leave space for hallways
140        maxRoomWidth = Math.min(test, maxRoomWidth);
141        minRoomWidth = Math.max(minRoomWidth, 2);
142        minRoomWidth = Math.min(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth);
143
144        test = (dungeonHeight - 3 * verticalRooms) / verticalRooms;//have to leave space for hallways
145        maxRoomHeight = Math.min(test, maxRoomHeight);
146        minRoomHeight = Math.max(minRoomHeight, 2);
147        minRoomHeight = Math.min(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight);
148    }
149
150    /**
151     * Builds and returns a map in the Classic Rogue style, returned as a 2D char array.
152     *
153     * Only includes rooms ('.' for floor and '#' for walls), corridors (using the same chars as rooms) and doors ('+'
154     * for closed doors, does not generate open doors).
155     * @return a 2D char array version of the map
156     */
157    public char[][] generate()
158    {
159        initRooms();
160        connectRooms();
161        connectUnconnectedRooms();
162        fullyConnect();
163        createRooms();
164        createCorridors();
165        return dungeon;
166    }
167
168    public char[][] getDungeon() {
169        return dungeon;
170    }
171
172    private void initRooms() {
173        rooms = new ClassicRogueRoom[horizontalRooms][verticalRooms];
174        dungeon = new char[dungeonWidth][dungeonHeight];
175        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
176            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
177                rooms[x][y] = new ClassicRogueRoom(0, 0, 0, 0, x, y);
178            }
179        }
180        for (int x = 0; x < dungeonWidth; x++) {
181            for (int y = 0; y < dungeonHeight; y++) {
182                dungeon[x][y] = '#';
183            }
184        }
185    }
186
187    private void connectRooms() {
188        ArrayList<ClassicRogueRoom> unconnected = new ArrayList<>();
189        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
190            unconnected.addAll(Arrays.asList(rooms[x]).subList(0, verticalRooms));
191        }
192        rng.shuffleInPlace(unconnected);
193
194        for (int i = 0; i < unconnected.size(); i++) {
195            ClassicRogueRoom room = unconnected.get(i);
196            rng.shuffle(Direction.CARDINALS, dirToCheck);
197            for (Direction dir : dirToCheck) {
198                int nextX = room.x + dir.deltaX;
199                int nextY = room.y + dir.deltaY;
200                if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms || nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
201                    continue;
202                }
203                ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
204
205                if (room.connections.contains(otherRoom)) {
206                    break;//already connected to this room
207                }
208
209                if (!otherRoom.connections.isEmpty()) {
210                    room.connections.add(otherRoom);
211                    break;
212                }
213            }
214        }
215    }
216
217    private void connectUnconnectedRooms() {
218        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
219            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
220                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
221
222                if (room.connections.isEmpty()) {
223                    rng.shuffle(Direction.CARDINALS, dirToCheck);
224
225                    boolean validRoom = false;
226                    ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = null;
227                    int idx = 0;
228                    do {
229                        Direction dir = dirToCheck[idx++];
230
231                        int nextX = x + dir.deltaX;
232                        if (nextX < 0 || nextX >= horizontalRooms) {
233                            continue;
234                        }
235                        int nextY = y + dir.deltaY;
236                        if (nextY < 0 || nextY >= verticalRooms) {
237                            continue;
238                        }
239
240                        otherRoom = rooms[nextX][nextY];
241                        validRoom = true;
242
243                        if (otherRoom.connections.contains(room)) {
244                            validRoom = false;
245                        }
246                        else {
247                            break;
248                        }
249                    } while (idx < 4);
250
251                    if (validRoom) {
252                        room.connections.add(otherRoom);
253                    }
254                }
255            }
256        }
257    }
258
259    private void fullyConnect() {
260        boolean allGood;
261        do {
262            ArrayDeque<ClassicRogueRoom> deq = new ArrayDeque<>(horizontalRooms * verticalRooms);
263            for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
264                for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
265                    deq.offer(rooms[x][y]);
266                }
267            }
268            ArrayList<ClassicRogueRoom> connected = new ArrayList<>();
269            connected.add(deq.removeFirst());
270            boolean changed = true;
271            TESTING:
272            while (changed) {
273                changed = false;
274                for (ClassicRogueRoom test : deq) {
275                    for (int i = 0, connectedSize = connected.size(); i < connectedSize; i++) {
276                        ClassicRogueRoom r = connected.get(i);
277                        if (test.connections.contains(r) || r.connections.contains(test)) {
278                            connected.add(test);
279                            deq.remove(test);
280                            changed = true;
281                            continue TESTING;
282                        }
283                    }
284                }
285            }
286
287            allGood = true;
288            if (!deq.isEmpty()) {
289                TESTING:
290                for (ClassicRogueRoom room : deq) {
291                    for (Direction dir : Direction.CARDINALS) {
292                        int x = room.cellx + dir.deltaX;
293                        int y = room.celly + dir.deltaY;
294                        if (x >= 0 && y >= 0 && x < horizontalRooms && y < verticalRooms) {
295                            ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = rooms[x][y];
296                            if (connected.contains(otherRoom)) {
297                                room.connections.add(otherRoom);
298                                allGood = false;
299                                break TESTING;
300                            }
301                        }
302                    }
303                }
304            }
305
306        } while (!allGood);
307    }
308
309    private void createRooms() {
310        int cwp = dungeonWidth / horizontalRooms;
311        int chp = dungeonHeight / verticalRooms;
312
313        ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom;
314
315        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
316            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
317                int sx = cwp * x;
318                int sy = chp * y;
319
320                sx = Math.max(sx, 2);
321                sy = Math.max(sy, 2);
322
323                int roomw = rng.between(minRoomWidth, maxRoomWidth + 1);
324                int roomh = rng.between(minRoomHeight, maxRoomHeight + 1);
325
326                if (y > 0) {
327                    otherRoom = rooms[x][y - 1];
328                    while (sy - (otherRoom.y + otherRoom.height) < 3) {
329                        sy++;
330                    }
331                }
332
333                if (x > 0) {
334                    otherRoom = rooms[x - 1][y];
335                    while (sx - (otherRoom.x + otherRoom.width) < 3) {
336                        sx++;
337                    }
338                }
339
340                int sxOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(cwp - roomw) * 0.5f);
341                int syOffset = Math.round(rng.nextInt(chp - roomh) * 0.5f);
342
343                while (sx + sxOffset + roomw >= dungeonWidth) {
344                    if (sxOffset > 0) {
345                        sxOffset--;
346                    } else {
347                        roomw--;
348                    }
349                }
350                while (sy + syOffset + roomh >= dungeonHeight) {
351                    if (syOffset > 0) {
352                        syOffset--;
353                    } else {
354                        roomh--;
355                    }
356                }
357
358                sx += sxOffset;
359                sy += syOffset;
360
361                ClassicRogueRoom r = rooms[x][y];
362                r.x = sx;
363                r.y = sy;
364                r.width = roomw;
365                r.height = roomh;
366
367                for (int xx = sx; xx < sx + roomw; xx++) {
368                    for (int yy = sy; yy < sy + roomh; yy++) {
369                        dungeon[xx][yy] = '.';
370                    }
371                }
372            }
373        }
374    }
375
376    private Coord randomWallPosition(ClassicRogueRoom room, Direction dir) {
377        int x, y;
378        Coord p = null;
379
380        switch (dir) {
381            case LEFT:
382                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
383                x = room.x - 1;
384                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
385                p = Coord.get(x - 1, y);
386                break;
387            case RIGHT:
388                y = rng.between(room.y + 1, room.y + room.height);
389                x = room.x + room.width;
390                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
391                p = Coord.get(x + 1, y);
392                break;
393            case DOWN:
394                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
395                y = room.y - 1;
396                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
397                p = Coord.get(x, y + 1);
398                break;
399            case UP:
400                x = rng.between(room.x + 1, room.x + room.width);
401                y = room.y + room.height;
402                dungeon[x][y] = '+';
403                p = Coord.get(x, y - 1);
404                break;
405        case NONE:
406                break;
407                case DOWN_LEFT:
408                case DOWN_RIGHT:
409                case UP_LEFT:
410                case UP_RIGHT:
411                        throw new IllegalStateException("There should only be cardinal positions here");
412        }
413
414        return p;
415    }
416
417    /**
418     * Draws a corridor between the two points with a zig-zag in between.
419     *
420     * @param start
421     * @param end
422     */
423    private void digPath(Coord start, Coord end) {
424        int xOffset = end.x - start.x;
425        int yOffset = end.y - start.y;
426        int xpos = start.x;
427        int ypos = start.y;
428
429        ArrayDeque<Magnitude> moves = new ArrayDeque<>();
430
431        int xAbs = Math.abs(xOffset);
432        int yAbs = Math.abs(yOffset);
433
434        double firstHalf = rng.nextDouble();
435        double secondHalf = 1 - firstHalf;
436
437        Direction xDir = xOffset < 0 ? Direction.LEFT : Direction.RIGHT;
438        Direction yDir = yOffset > 0 ? Direction.DOWN : Direction.UP;
439
440        if (xAbs < yAbs) {
441            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(yAbs * firstHalf);
442            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
443            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, xAbs));
444            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(yAbs * secondHalf);
445            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, tempDist));
446        } else {
447            int tempDist = (int) Math.ceil(xAbs * firstHalf);
448            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
449            moves.add(new Magnitude(yDir, yAbs));
450            tempDist = (int) Math.floor(xAbs * secondHalf);
451            moves.add(new Magnitude(xDir, tempDist));
452        }
453
454        dungeon[xpos][ypos] = '.';
455
456        while (!moves.isEmpty()) {
457            Magnitude move = moves.removeFirst();
458            Direction dir = move.dir;
459            int dist = move.distance;
460            while (dist > 0) {
461                xpos += dir.deltaX;
462                ypos += dir.deltaY;
463                dungeon[xpos][ypos] = '.';
464                dist--;
465            }
466        }
467    }
468
469    private void createCorridors() {
470        for (int x = 0; x < horizontalRooms; x++) {
471            for (int y = 0; y < verticalRooms; y++) {
472                ClassicRogueRoom room = rooms[x][y];
473                for (int r = 0; r < room.connections.size(); r++) {
474                    ClassicRogueRoom otherRoom = room.connections.getAt(r);
475                    Direction dir = Direction.getCardinalDirection(otherRoom.cellx - room.cellx, otherRoom.celly - room.celly);
476                    digPath(randomWallPosition(room, dir), randomWallPosition(otherRoom, dir.opposite()));
477                }
478            }
479        }
480    }
481
482    private static class Magnitude {
483
484        public Direction dir;
485        public int distance;
486
487        public Magnitude(Direction dir, int distance) {
488            this.dir = dir;
489            this.distance = distance;
490        }
491    }
492}
